about_the_game:
Bring on your game’s Steampunk revolution with this Steampunk exterior tileset for RPG Maker!

The Steampunk Exterior Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Grass tiles
Sandy tile
Wood tile
Sidewalk tiles
Asphalt/dark stone tile
Dark rock texture
Wall pipe system
Dark grass/moss
Machinery
Chains
Fences
Gears
Cracks and holes

Walls:

Brick, sandy, metal panels, textured, hanging chains and more! Many have multiple colors. Also includes some industrial tiles so you can build factory-like details into the walls.
Also includes multiple styles and colors of roofing!

Also includes:

Lots of lamps and unique lights
Steampunk playground equipment
Fountain
Unusual trees with mechanical details
Wall decor – highly detailed windows, frames, clocks, indicator lights, switches and plug-ins, dials, and other Steampunk staples
Shop goods – bins with produce, bakery, fresh meat/fish
Unique planters with interesting plants
Mini lighting kit, with additional shadows + pillars of light
Chains, ropes and cables
Valves, switches, levers and other details (includes on/off state)
Pipe system
Random trash
Shop signage and storefront tiles
Huge clocks
Roof system
Train tracks
and more!

Events and Animations

Several styles of doors, with light and dark interiors
Trunk that opens
Two types of valves, in both floor and wall perspective, in small and large sizes.
Lever animation
Clock hands
Old car

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
